content: विमानः --नं {@--1@} Disrespect, dishonour. {@--2@} A measure. {@--3@} A balloon, a heavenly car (moving through the skies); पदं विमानेन विगाहमानः <ls>R. 13. 1</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 51</ls>; विमानीकृतराजहंसमंडलः <ls>K.</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 104</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 45</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 40</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 43</ls>; <ls>Ki. 7. 11.</ls> {@--4@} A vehicle or conveyance in general; <ls>R. 16. 68.</ls> {@--5@} A palace (with seven stories); नेत्रा नीताः सततगतिना यद्विमानाग्रभूमीः <ls>Me. 69.</ls> {@--6@} A horse.

विमानः --नं {@--1@} Disrespect, dishonour. {@--2@} A measure. {@--3@} A balloon, a heavenly car (moving through the skies); पदं विमानेन विगाहमानः <ls>R. 13. 1</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 51</ls>; विमानीकृतराजहंसमंडलः <ls>K.</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 104</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 45</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 40</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 43</ls>; <ls>Ki. 7. 11.</ls> {@--4@} A vehicle or conveyance in general; <ls>R. 16. 68.</ls> {@--5@} A palace (with seven stories); नेत्रा नीताः सततगतिना यद्विमानाग्रभूमीः <ls>Me. 69.</ls> {@--6@} A horse.
